jobDescription: Job Title* Data Scientist ***Critical Requirement ID 29982 Location* Boston, MA Duration* 6 - 9 months Job Description*  Overall atleast 7+ years work-ex; Data Scientist with 3-4 years of core DS work; the rest could be a Data engineering, DW, ETL or whatever background Am not looking for any domain specific but FS would be a good to have; if not, its Ok Self-starter type and not someone who needs to be hand held or provided suggestions on what to doBACK | APPLY NOW
